text:
NaEB 39th Annual Convention
REGISTRATION list
November 18, 1963
Anderson, James, Chief, Production Branch, TV Division, U.S. Army Signal School,
Fort Monmouth, New Jersey.
Ausprich, Harry, Chairman, Department of Speech & Drama, Memphis State Univer¬
sity, Memphis, Tennessee.
Bendickson, A.J., Sales Representative, Miratel Electronics, New Brighton,
Minnesota.
Blake, Robert L., Director, A-V Education, Sioux Falls Public Schools, Sioux
Falls, South Dakota.
Blenheim, Laurence C., WRTI-FM, Temple University, Philadelphia, Pennsylvania.
Bornstein, Ronald C., Program and Production Manager, University of Michigan
TV, 310 Maynard, Ann Arbor, Michigan.
Bowman, Richard J., Producer-Director, University of Michigan Television Center,
310 Maynard Street, Ann Arbor, Michigan.
Brugger, John R., Educational TV Facilities Program, Office of Education,
Washington, D.C.
Buckstaff, John, Assistant Director—Broadcasting, University of Chicago, 1307
East 60th, Chicago, Illinois.
Bussey, H.M., Director of Radio & Television, Loyola University, 820 N. Michigan,
Chicago 11, Illinois.
Campion, Lee E., Director, Division of Educational Communications, New York
State Department of Education, Albany 1, New York.
Coates, Thomas B., Art Director, University of Michigan TV, Ann Arbor, Michigan*
Conrad, Brother I., F.S.C., Superintendent, Bishop Noll Institute, 1519 Hoffman
Street, Hammond, Indiana.
Cox, Kenneth D., International Representative, International Brotherhood of
Electrical Workers, 1200 15th Street, N.W., Washington, D.C.

Debrodt, Robert Earl, Producer-Writer, University of Michigan TV Center, 310
Maynard, Ann Arbor, Michigan.
Denovan, Nancy S.f University of Michigan, 2109 Woodland, Royal Oak, Michigan.
Deusing, Murl, 5325 West Van Beck, Milwaukee, Wisconsin.

Melvindale, Michigan.

Elliott, Gordon, Director, Publications, W.A. Krueger Co., 12821 Blue Mound
